name: STEAMPUNCH
description:
Step into the shoes of a 19th century JANITORIAL ENGINEER and clean up the acid pests that have infested the CLOCKWORK STORAGE TOWER.

  • WASD - Move
  • Arrow Keys - Attack
  • Space + Arrow Keys - Grapple

Made for the 2022 LOWREZJAM by
Sean Mansell - Game Design & Programming
Mort - Audio, Level Design & Programming
Daniel James Freer - Pixels

Known Issues:

  • Sometimes your grapple won't reel you in. You can "fix" this yourself by just pretending it is. :)
  • Controller support is unreliable.
  • You won't die in some levels of the tutorial. Its a bodge fix!
